Paid Media

start a project

Our Process

Paid Media is becoming more holistic day by day. Your customers live on every platform, and your brand should too. From upper funnel CTV/OTT campaigns to paid search and shopping ads, DLVRD Media has a plan tailored to your brands needs, wants, and goals.

discovery

Where are we now?
  • Client Goals and KPI’s
  • Current state of account
  • Market and competitive analytics
  • Initial roadmap

Strategy

How do we get where we want to be?
  • Ongoing market research and analysis
  • Prioritization, timelines, and budgeting
  • Framing, targeting, and positioning
  • Cross-department collaboration - holistic media

Execution

Where the rubber meets the road
  • Tactical planning and implementation
  • Campaign building and structure
  • Bi-weekly optimization
  • Driving towards our KPI’s

01. CTV/OTT

Connected TV is the new way people are watching television. As traditional TV declines, CTV quickly fills the void. With 80% of the US owning a CTV device, your brand now has the ability to transform television into a performance machine. Put your brand on the big screen to be seen on services like Hulu, Pluto, Sling, CBS, and more.
paid media
How an Integrated SEO Strategy Helped Brown Jordan Outdoor Kitchens Become the Industry Leader

02. Display and Native

Capitalize on the mass reach and micro-optimizations of a demand side platform (DSP) for consumer introduction to your brand with relevant display and native ads across various publishers, sites, ad formats, and devices. Display advertising also pairs well with CTV to create actionable ways to purchase by retargeting CTV viewers with a display ad.
paid media
How an Integrated SEO Strategy Helped Brown Jordan Outdoor Kitchens Become the Industry Leader

03. YouTube

It is no secret that video has gone from an option to a necessity in recent years. YouTube is the second largest search engine in the world, which means your brand needs to be here. In the past, YouTube was seen as a brand awareness channel, but in recent times has become so much more. With detailed targeting, and a variety of ad types, YouTube is here to stay.
paid media
How an Integrated SEO Strategy Helped Brown Jordan Outdoor Kitchens Become the Industry Leader

04. Google Search and Shopping

Google paid search and shopping ads are important to driving revenue and staying ahead of, and quite literally on top, of your competition. With billions of searches per day on Google, your brand can utilize search ads to make sure sure your customers not only notice you, but take action. Google shopping allows customers to search, view, and compare products from different sellers. Customers can easily see a side by side comparison of the prices of those sellers.
paid media
How an Integrated SEO Strategy Helped Brown Jordan Outdoor Kitchens Become the Industry Leader
